name: ZnopChains
description:
Znop Chain is a brain challenging game. Player need to memorize and recreate the complex chains of hexagon. It is one of the toughest games which will push the limits of the brain

How to play ?
1. First the chain of color sequence is played,

2. You watch and observe carefully

3. When your turn comes, press the hexagons to recreate the znop chain in the same order.

4. Lets see how much is your memory power.

One of the most common problem now a days is memory power after coming to smart phone era. Everyone starts to refer to phone and internet to get data which they already know. This game helps you to increase brain power and remember complex things and get them from your brain.
